cross: Cattleya Lulu x Cattleya Penny Kuroda

measurements.description: Forty-one flowers and 30 buds on five 25-cm upright inflorescences; plant 86cm x 82cm, grown in 25-cm plastic pot; sepals rose, magenta speckles occuring randomly; petals rose, dark magenta peloric band medially, sparse magenta speckles; lip white overlaid rose, sidelobes overlapping column, midlobe crenulated, magenta distally, isthmus pale yellow, keels magenta; column white overlaid rose, anther cap pale yellow; substance firm; texture matte; mericlone peloric mutation of 'Hollybourne'.
